data.title: Do not order for delivery
data.text: Horrible customer service! Ordered at 5:45 told me would receive no later than 7pm. It is 7:30 still no order. They are 2 miles from my house! I called twice just for them to say it's on the way 20 mins go by and nothing. I am telling the driver I don't want it and won't pay. I will never order again.

data.title: Terrible
data.text: The hotel recommended this place to me. It took them an hour to arrive though they told me 40 minutes, the woman I placed my order with was incompetent (would you like your manicotti over spaghetti, she asked), the food was terrible, and they forgot silverware. Do not order from this place!

data.title: Awful
data.text: Very bad food not good at all please people do not go there trust me customer service sub par and the owner is not to friendly
